title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 566.2 - Water supplied without direct charge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 566.2 - Water supplied without direct charge

State Regulations

Water supplied to municipalities, or to other
governmental units, without charge, in accordance with franchise and similar
requirements, shall be charged to account 927, Franchise Requirements, and
credited concurrently to account 929, Duplicate

Charges--Credit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
566.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
